nodes.text: The Dauntless Star was a Republic cruiser of Mon Calamari design.
It was considered a beautiful ship and a classic Mon Cal design by the Imperial Captain Vujaar at the Imperial Reclamation Service. The ship was fitted with several cannons.
The cruiser fought at the Battle of Hoth where it shot down over 60 Imperial fighters. It was eventually defeated and crashed onto the surface of Hoth.
